title: Net Advisory Token Distribution
body:
There is a residual amount of tokens requested that are contractually obligated to advisors of the project from 2019 & 2020 which will have to be awarded, as the mStableDAO has not yet honoured these obligations to date.

These tokens are for advisory services these individuals provided since 2019 and continue to provide to this day.

The total amount requested for these advisors amounts to **1,325,338.8 MTA** and are a non-recurring expense for the remaining life-cycle of this project. This will be a once off disbursement of MTA and clears the remaining obligation to advisors assuming they serve full terms.

It should be noted that should recipients of these tokens cease contributing to mStable before the full 3 year work term as specified in the original advisory agreement, they risk having the Sablier stream into which these tokens will be sent for them being cancelled.

If successful, the tokens will be sent to the mStable Sablier Multisig Address for distribution: 0x87a4f91dfc400b44BCAe04f7025789642aF85611

**Should we honour this contractual obligation and distribute the owed tokens to the multisig?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
